description: [Versa Director Zero Day Exploitation](https://attack.mitre.org/campaigns/C0039) established HTTPS communications from adversary-controlled SOHO devices over port 443 with compromised Versa Director servers.(Citation: Lumen Versa 2024)

external_references.description: Black Lotus Labs. (2024, August 27). Taking The Crossroads: The Versa Director Zero-Day Exploitaiton. Retrieved August 27, 2024.
